intro.title: Getting Started with RawBlock
intro.hook: Follow these steps and start building great projects with RawBlock.

productItems.title: Starter Kit
productItems.hook: To boost your project startup. Start your project with the Rawblock Starter Kit.

productItems.title: Grid Layout
productItems.hook: We use flexible, multi-device and human readable syntax to setup the basis of your site.

productItems.title: Components
productItems.hook: A key aspect of RawBlock is modularity. We archieve this by creating isolated components who are context unaware.
